flawed_nl_solution:
There are 60 minutes in an hour, so the superhero will run 60 / 4 = <<60/4=15>>15 intervals of 10 miles in an hour.
Thus, the superhero can run 15 * 10 = <<15*10=510>>510 miles in an hour.
The superhero can run 510 - 100 = <<510-100=410>>410 miles farther than the supervillain can drive in an hour.
#### 410

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 150, not 510. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
